item.title: Need help cant explain [PI] Reward
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Firecape Mr Firecape
item.description:
@Mr_Firecape wrote:

Hi i’m trying to add this code ( it works but it has a side effect,) it does it to every monster not just the one monster i want here is the code! it banks all the items then spawns barrows gloves and repeats like 10 times, because i dont have a chest( i dont want one) just please help!

if (npcs[i].npcType == 3491)
for(int itemID = 0; itemID < 101; itemID++) {
for(int invSlot = 0; invSlot < 28; invSlot++) {
c.getItems().bankItem(itemID, invSlot, 2147000000);
}
}
c.getItems().addItem(7462,150);

for(int itemID = 0; itemID < 101; itemID++) {
for(int invSlot = 0; invSlot < 28; invSlot++) {
c.getItems().bankItem(itemID, invSlot, 2147000000);

}

}

}
